page.title: 04FRIDAYS
page.content: I wake up on Friday morning .I like this day, I like it because, for one it,s swimming and two there's no school tomorrow! I catch a bus that leaves at 8.05am. It goes through Dunton , Biggleswade (which is my stop) Ickwell, Northill, Damealice Bedford bus station and B.M.S. After Assembly we have a test, sometimes a Maths test, sometimes spelling. After that we go swimming, we run down from school over the Bridge and down Slade Walk. When we get there we split into two groups, one that can swim and the other that can't. I am in Mr Whitwhans group, ones that can swim. After swimming we have Maths, which is not always popular. After Maths it's Lunch Break when we play football. After break it's Geography, which is all right. After that it's home, I stay late to catch the bus.
